name: American MahJong Practice 2019
description:
MahJong Practice 2019 is pattern practice for real American MahJong with Charleston. Play fun, quick games offline, anywhere, anytime. No internet connection needed.

The Tile Counting feature assists in strategy decisions. Test your game strategy with the Replay option. This is the best way to learn new cards and new combinations.

A game ends when you mahjong or the wall of tiles runs out. Opponent bots discard randomly. They do not exchange jokers or declare mahjong.

The Info button in the app provides details about the mechanics of moving tiles. For beginners, reference Standard American MahJong rules and videos online. You should know basic rules before using this app because rules are not enforced.
